DEFECT.DESCRIPTION: Consider using 'IoAllocateMdl' instead of 'MmCreateMdl'. Reason: Obsolete.
Consider using 'MmMapLockedPagesSpecifyCache' instead of 'MmMapLockedPages'. Reason: Obsolete except on Windows 98. Use MmGetSystemAddressForMdlSafe if this is a call to MmGetSystemAddressForMdl..
The opaque MDL structure should not be modified by a driver.
The Drivers module has inferred that the current function is a DRIVER_INITIALIZE function: This is informational only. No problem has been detected.
The function being assigned or passed should be a DRIVER_UNLOAD function: Add the declaration 'DRIVER_UNLOAD Unload;' before the current first declaration of Unload.
